import React from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Header() { const wishlist = useSelector((state)=>state.wishlistReducer) return ( <> Shopify
Wishlist {wishlist.length} Cart 10
) } export default Header
